snippets:
[

	// Dashes
	// {trigger: "--", replacement: "–", options: "tA"},
	// {trigger: "–-", replacement: "—", options: "tA"},
	// {trigger: "—-", replacement: "---", options: "tA"},


	// Greek letters
	{trigger: "@a", replacement: "\\alpha", options: "mA"},
	{trigger: "@A", replacement: "\\Alpha", options: "mA"},
	{trigger: "@b", replacement: "\\beta", options: "mA"},
	{trigger: "@B", replacement: "\\Beta", options: "mA"},
	{trigger: "@c", replacement: "\\chi", options: "mA"},
	{trigger: "@C", replacement: "\\Chi", options: "mA"},
	{trigger: "@g", replacement: "\\gamma", options: "mA"},
	{trigger: "@G", replacement: "\\Gamma", options: "mA"},
	{trigger: "@d", replacement: "\\delta", options: "mA"},
	{trigger: "@D", replacement: "\\Delta", options: "mA"},
	{trigger: "@e", replacement: "\\epsilon", options: "mA"},
	{trigger: "@E", replacement: "\\Epsilon", options: "mA"},
	{trigger: ":e", replacement: "\\varepsilon", options: "mA"},
	{trigger: ":E", replacement: "\\varepsilon", options: "mA"},
	{trigger: "@z", replacement: "\\zeta", options: "mA"},
	{trigger: "@Z", replacement: "\\Zeta", options: "mA"},
	{trigger: "@t", replacement: "\\theta", options: "mA"},
	{trigger: "@T", replacement: "\\Theta", options: "mA"},
	{trigger: "@k", replacement: "\\kappa", options: "mA"},
	{trigger: "@K", replacement: "\\Kappa", options: "mA"},
	{trigger: "@l", replacement: "\\lambda", options: "mA"},
	{trigger: "@L", replacement: "\\Lambda", options: "mA"},
	{trigger: "@m", replacement: "\\mu", options: "mA"},
	{trigger: "@M", replacement: "\\Mu", options: "mA"},
	{trigger: "@r", replacement: "\\rho", options: "mA"},
	{trigger: "@R", replacement: "\\Rho", options: "mA"},
	{trigger: "@s", replacement: "\\sigma", options: "mA"},
	{trigger: "@S", replacement: "\\Sigma", options: "mA"},
	{trigger: "ome",replacement: "\\omega", options: "mA"},
	{trigger: "@o", replacement: "\\omega", options: "mA"},
	{trigger: "@O", replacement: "\\Omega", options: "mA"},
    {trigger: "@p", replacement: "\\varphi", options: "mA"},
    {trigger: "@P", replacement: "\\Phi", options: "mA"},

    //Custom
    {trigger: "-land", replacement: "\\land", options: "mA"},
    {trigger: "-lor", replacement: "\\lor", options: "mA"},
    {trigger: "-s", replacement: "\\space", options: "mA"},
    {trigger: "-bslash", replacement: "\\backslash", options: "mA"},
    {trigger: "-tilde", replacement: "\\text{\\textasciitilde}", options: "mA"},
    {trigger: "-esis", replacement: "\\exists ", options: "mA"},

    {trigger: "-nesis", replacement: "\\nexists ", options: "mA"},
    {trigger: "-fora", replacement: "\\forall\ ", options: "mA"},
    {trigger: "-nat", replacement: "\\mathbb{N}", options: "mA"},
    {trigger: "-int", replacement: "\\mathbb{Z}", options: "mA"},
    {trigger: "-raz", replacement: "\\mathbb{Q}", options: "mA"},
    {trigger: "-irraz", replacement: "\\mathbb{I}", options: "mA"},
    {trigger: "-compl", replacement: "\\mathbb{C}", options: "mA"},
    {trigger: "-real", replacement: "\\mathbb{R}", options: "mA"},
    {trigger: "-btick", replacement: "``` ```", options: "mA"},
    {trigger: "\\implied", replacement: "\\Longleftarrow", options: "mA"},
    {trigger: "\-{", replacement: "\\{ \\}", options: "mA"},
    {trigger: "\\voidset", replacement: "\\emptyset", options: "mA"},
    {trigger: "\\nex", replacement: "\\nexists", options: "mA"},
    {trigger: "\\copre", replacement: "\\leftarrowtail", options: "mA"},
    {trigger: "-larr", replacement: "\\leftarrow", options: "mA"},
    {trigger: "-llarr", replacement: "\\longleftarrow", options: "mA"},
    {trigger: "-rarr", replacement: "\\rightarrow", options: "mA"},
    {trigger: "-rrarr", replacement: "\\longrightarrow", options: "mA"},
    {trigger: "-cmpst", replacement: "\\circ", options: "mA"},
    {trigger: "\\naturali", replacement: "\\mathbb{N}", options: "mA"},
    {trigger: "\\interi", replacement: "\\mathbb{Z}", options: "mA"},
    {trigger: "\\razionali", replacement: "\\mathbb{Q}", options: "mA"},
    {trigger: "\\irrazionali", replacement: "\\mathbb{I}", options: "mA"},
    {trigger: "\\reali", replacement: "\\mathbb{R}", options: "mA"},
    {trigger: "\\complessi", replacement: "\\mathbb{C}", options: "mA"},
    {trigger: "\\sistema", replacement: "\\begin{cases} \\end{cases}", options: "mA"},
    {trigger: "\\relaz", replacement: "\\space\\rho\\space\ ", options: "mA"},
    {trigger: "-.", replacement: "\\star\ ", options: "mA"},
    {trigger: "\\per", replacement: "\\cdot\ ", options: "mA"},
    {trigger: "-divide", replacement: "\\space|\\space", options: "mA"},
    {trigger: "-align", replacement: "\\begin{align} \\end{align}", options: "mA"},
    {trigger: "-modn", replacement: "\\equiv b\\text{ (mod }n)", options: "mA"},
    {trigger: "-nondiv", replacement: "\\nmid", options: "mA"},
    {trigger: "-vmatrix", replacement: "\\begin{vmatrix} \\end{vmatrix}", options: "mA"},
]

rawSettings.matrixShortcutsEnvNames: pmatrix, cases, align, bmatrix, Bmatrix, vmatrix, Vmatrix, array, matrix
